title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 6, 1897. Donations for Benefit Dance

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 6, 1897. DONATIONS FOR BENEFIT DANCE

body.p: Many contributions have been received for the benefit dance being sponsored by the Carol Chodkiewicz Society for the Polish Hospital. The following donations have been received recently:
Francis Cholewczynski: half barrel of beer, twelve boxes of cigars, and one dozen bottles of wine.
Andrew Duszkewski: ten pounds of sauage and one ham.
Albert Konka: two bottles of Hennessey brandy.
B. F. Cizewski: six bottles of wine.
S. Popek: one dozen bottles of wine.
F. Kaeding: three bottles of wine.
Sincere thanks are extended to the donors.
